comment.label_en:
If you want to filter the values that are evaluated for the generation of groups for each Tag identified in the group generator add a pipe ("|") delimited list of values that you want to use for the associated hierarchy tag.
e.g. for group_name - enter a list of cd_domains that are to be used to limit the operation |cd_clinical|cd_quality|
Note : invalid values (that are not part of the configuration) will be not generated.
